thread.title: Jordan Peele jokes about impending fatherhood: 'Kids are creepy'
thread.title_full: Jordan Peele jokes about impending fatherhood: 'Kids are creepy'

author: USA TODAY
title: Jordan Peele jokes about impending fatherhood: 'Kids are creepy'
text:
Jordan Peele jokes about impending fatherhood: 'Kids are creepy' Brian Truitt , USA TODAY 12:44 p.m. ET Feb. 23, 2017 
The soon-to-be parents. (Photo: Vincent Sandoval, WireImage) 
Jordan Peele delivers his new baby this week — and he's also got a kid on the way. 
The former Key & Peele star's mind spawned the social thriller Get Out , which hits theater Friday. Meanwhile, the comedian's also preparing for fatherhood after wife Chelsea Peretti's Instagram announcement (with Beyonce reference, obviously) that they're expecting their first child. (The twosome eloped last April.) 
He's a little scared — as any new dad would be — though he told us his horror-movie fandom adds to the fear. CLOSE
